section.title: Inserting Cross References
section.p: Cross reference links to Open API documents or to content inside of them can be inserted by invoking the Link Cross Reference... action from the contextual menu.
Example: This is a cross reference to an operation from the OpenAPI document: PUT/examples.
Example: This is a cross reference to a schema from the OpenAPI document: Example.

section.title: Inserting Content References
section.p: For referencing reused content from OpenAPI documents, you can invoke the Reuse Reuse Content... action from the contextual menu.
